column1: Startup Financial Model - The Indian Startup
1. Revenue growth based on market research and competitive analysis
2. Customer acquisition costs derived from marketing channel analysis
3. Operating expenses scaled with revenue growth and team expansion
4. Capital requirements estimated based on technology and infrastructure needs
5. Funding timeline aligned with growth milestones and cash flow requirements
□ Market size validated through primary research
□ Pricing strategy tested with potential customers
□ Funding requirements aligned with business plan
□ Key metrics reviewed with industry standards
